hero.name: Software Development Services
hero.heading: Social Responsibilities
hero.desc: We believe we must make our world a great place. We align it with our employees, communities, and customers to make that happen.

patriotismSection.heading: We love India
desc: At Atonis Technologies, we believe in supporting the hardworking individuals who help keep our country running. That is why we are proud to support our farmers and soldiers.
As an Indian web design & development company, we offer more than 50% discounts to all of our farmers & soldiers in all of our services.

We offer military personnel and veterans, including family members, a special discount on every project regardless of the project price, as thanks for their sacrifice. We also offer discounts to non-profit organizations.
It is always an honor to work with our farmers, soldiers, their families, and non-profit organizations. This is the least we can do as gratitude.

cards.heading: We love to Donate ‚ù§Ô∏è
cards.desc: We love to donate some part of our profit for various causes regularly, but we don't like to show it off.

cards.heading: We love Nature üå¥ üçÅ üåø üåµ üçÄ üçÉ
cards.desc: We try our bit to save the planet. Wherever possible, we try to reduce the carbon footprint & save water.

cards.heading: We love specially-abled children ‚ù§Ô∏è
cards.desc: We believe that every child is special and born with some unique ability. We try to motivate and encourage them whenever we meet.
